divs: Sighting Details I looked up to watch passing commercial jets high in the sky and all of a sudden I saw a silent triangle with faint lights glide over me from east to west. appeared 5,000 feet to 18,000 feet. it appeared very large maybe 1,000 feet across. I am a pilot and know this was no airplane I have ever seen. It appeared to glide past at high rate of speed. It was amazing as it glided towards the ocean heading 240 degrees to the west.
trends: There have been 49 other sightings in Huntington Beach
There was one other sighting in Huntington Beach on or around February 17th 2012
Summary: silent huge triangle with faint white light on leading edge may have had six light on each wing
